app-desc: Welcome to the FRDR Encryption App. You can use the app to encrypt, decrypt, and share access to sensitive datasets with the Federated Research Data Repository.
app-desc-homepage: Welcome to the FRDR Encryption App. You can use the app to encrypt sensitive datasets before uploading them to FRDR, to decrypt datasets that you have accessed through FRDR, and to manage who has access to your sensitive datasets.
app-login-frdr-desc: You need to log into FRDR first.
app-login-url-tooltip: If running for development, probably http://127.0.0.1:8200.
app-login-frdr-success-message: Authentication to FRDR successful, you can close the browser now.
app-login-vault-desc: You need to log into Vault for key management.
app-login-vault-error:
Error logging into HashiCorp Vault with Globus OAuth. 
$1
app-login-vault-success-message: Authentication to HashiCorp Vault successful, you can close the browser now.
app-login-vault-local-keys-error-title: Error with local public and private key pair
app-login-vault-local-keys-error-text: You are not able to use FRDR Encryption App on this device
app-encrypt-input-tooltip: Select the directory containing the dataset you want to encrypt
app-encrypt-input-missing: Please select the directory containing the dataset you want to encrypt.
app-encrypt-output-tooltip: Select a local directory location that you can upload from to FRDR for your encrypted package. Your encrypted package only needs to be at this location temporarily.
app-encrypt-output-missing: Please select the directory location for your encrypted package.
app-encrypt-confirm: After you encrypt your dataset you CANNOT add or change files. Please ensure the dataset is COMPLETE before you encrypt the dataset.
app-encrypt-done: Dataset has been encrypted and transfer package has been created on $1
app-encrypt-done-text1: Your dataset has been encrypted. Please continue with your data deposit and upload the encrypted package to FRDR once you reach the Transfer Data tab.
app-grant-access-desc: To approve this access request you must grant access in the FRDR Encryption App and on FRDR. Please retrieve the Dataset ID and the Requester ID from the email sent to you about this access request.
app-grant-access-dataset-tooltip: To grant access to a dataset insert the Dataset ID
app-grant-access-dataset-missing: Please insert the Dataset ID to grant access to a dataset.
app-grant-access-requester-tooltip: To grant access to a dataset insert the user ID of the requester
app-grant-access-requester-missing: Please insert the user ID of the requester to grant access to a dataset
app-grant-access-expire-info: The access period will automatically be 6 months from the date you grant access.
app-grant-access-expire-tooltip: The date that this access is going to expire
app-grant-access-confirm:
You are trying to grant requester $1 access to dataset $2. 

Please confirm the dataset name and requester name are correct before granting access. 

Do you want to continue?
app-grant-access-find-user-error:
Error finding the user in Vault. 
$1.
app-grant-access-find-dataset-error:
Error finding the dataset in FRDR. 
$1.
app-grant-access-done-title: You have successfully granted access to the decryption key for this dataset
app-grant-access-done-text: Please return to FRDR to complete your approval by digitally signing the data access agreement.
app-request-access-intro1: Your Vault User ID is needed for a sensitive data access request. This ID has been sent to FRDR automatically and you can find it on your
app-request-access-intro2: page on FRDR and it will be pre-populated for all your access requests. If you find it not set on FRDR, please contact support@frdr-dfdr.ca for help.
app-request-access-confirm-msg: Please copy the following id to the Requester ID Field on the Access Request Page on FRDR.
app-decrypt-desc: To decrypt this dataset you must retrieve the Key URL from the email sent to you about this access request.
app-decrypt-url-tooltip: Insert the Vault Key URL available in the email you received about this access request
app-decrypt-url-missing: Please insert the Vault Key URL available in the email you received about this access request.
app-decrypt-input-tooltip: Select the encrypted package you want to decrypt
app-decrypt-input-missing: Please select the encrypted package you want to decrypt.
app-decrypt-output-tooltip: Select a location for the decrypted dataset. Please ensure the selected location is appropriate for this dataset
app-decrypt-output-missing: Please select a location for the decrypted dataset.
app-decrypt-confirm:
You are attempting to decrypt the dataset $1. 

Please only proceed if you are using a trusted computer approved by your institution.

Do you want to continue?
app-profile-copy-error-2: Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C or Command+C, Enter
app-get-entity-id-error:
Error getting user entity id on Vault. 
$1.
app-get-entity-name-error:
Error getting user email on Vault. 
$1.
app-footer-copyright: Â© 2021 Digital Research Alliance of Canada
app-get-entity-id-from-frdr-error: Your Vault ID is not retrieved from FRDR successfully. Please go to Settings page and make sure it is set correctly on FRDR
app-send-entity-id-to-frdr-error: Your Vault User ID has not been sent to FRDR successfully. Please contact support@frdr-dfdr.ca for help.
